headline: Constellation Brands Short Interest Eases As Valuation Signals Potential Upside
summary: Short interest in Constellation Brands (NYSE:STZ) has fallen in the latest reporting period. Despite the decline, the company’s short interest remains above the average level seen across its peer group. The shift points to changing views among traders while still reflecting pockets of skepticism around the stock. Constellation Brands, the owner of major beer, wine, and spirits labels, sits at the center of long running trends in premium alcoholic beverages and consumer brand loyalty. For...
